issues.info: If you find any bugs, please report them on the mod's GitHub page.

hide_button_pos.name: Button Position
hide_button_pos.description: Position of the button inside the pause menu.

screenshot_mode.name: Screenshot Mode
screenshot_mode.description:
Hide the 'Hide Pause Menu' button when the Pause Menu is hidden.
This is useful for taking screenshots without the button being in the way.
With this enabled, just click/tap the screen to re-show the pause menu.
